document.full_text: soldiers of ivory coast's rival leaders battled for the presidential palace, military bases and state tv in the main city abidjan saturday, in a conflict so brutal that 800 people have been killed in just one town.
document.title: fighting rages in ivory coast, 800 dead in west
lines_and_colors: soldiers of ivory coast's rival leaders battled for the presidential palace, military bases and state tv in the main city abidjan saturday, in a conflict so brutal that 800 people have been killed in just one town.
